data.title: Elvis Presley Awards
data.meta_description: Elvis Presley was one of the most acclaimed musicians of all time. Visit the Entertainer Career Museum at our exhibit and entertainment complex to see all of his awards and honors.
data.text: SINGLE / EP / ALBUM TYPE OF AWARD Big Hunk O' Love Gold Record A Big Hunk O' Love Grammy nomination for Best Rhythm & Blues Performance, 1959 A Big Hunk O' Love Grammy nomination for Best Performance by a Top 40 Artist, 1959 A Legendary Performer, Vol. 2 The Golden Boot Award, 1974 A Legendary Performer, Vol. 2 Gold Record A Legendary Performer, Vol. 1 The Golden Boot Award, 1974 A Mess of Blues Gold Record All Shook Up American Bandstand Poll Best Record, 1957 Anyway You Want Me Gold Record Are You Lonesome Tonight?
